text: Shoddy the Tailor is a 1915 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Raymond McKee - Henry Buggs * Harry Lorraine - Police Chief * Mabel Paige - Myrtle, an Old Maid * Frances Ne Moyer - Minnie * Eva Bell - Clara * Nellie Farron - Ruth * Oliver Hardy - Policeman (as Babe Hardy) ==See also== * List of American films of 1915 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1915 comedy films Category:1915 short films Category:American comedy films Category:Lubin Manufacturing Company films Category:Comedy short films
title: Shoddy the Tailor
